Description: These bits are read as 0. The write value should be 0.
0: Read SPDR/SPDR_HA values from the receive buffer 1: Read SPDR/SPDR_HA values from the transmit buffer (but only if the transmit buffer is empty).
0: Set SPDR_HA to valid for halfword access 1: Set SPDR to valid for word access.
These bits are read as 0. The write value should be 0.
